```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Data Preprocessing
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(countrycode)
library(WDI)
library(rgho)
library(funModeling)
library(plotly)
library(sjlabelled)
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)
library(htmltools)



indicators_name <- c("Preparedness",
                "Median availability of selected generic medicines",
                "Ill-defined causes in cause-of-death registration",
                "Median consumer price ratio of selected generic medicines",
                "Care-seeking by type of patient and source of care")

indicators <- data.frame()
for (i in indicators_name) {
  indicator_code <- rgho:::to_data_frame(search_codes(i, dimension = "GHO"))
  indicators <- rbind.data.frame(indicators, indicator_code)
}



mydata = data.frame(COUNTRY=character())
for (i in indicators$ID) {
  result <- get_gho_data(
    dimension = "GHO",
    filter = list(
      REGION = "AFR"),
    code = i
  )
  if (class(result$YEAR)=="numeric") {
    result = result %>% group_by(COUNTRY) %>% 
      slice(which.max(YEAR)) 
  }
  
  xx =  result %>% 
    select(COUNTRY, `Display Value`)
  colnames(xx)[2] <- i
  k=match(i,indicators$ID)
  label(xx[[i]]) <- indicators[k,1]
  mydata <- full_join(mydata, xx)
}



df <- mydata %>% 
  label_to_colnames() %>%
  mutate(Country = countrycode(COUNTRY,
                               origin = "iso3c",
                               destination = "country.name"),
         COUNTRY = "Kenya"
         )

df[,1:8] <- sapply(df[,1:8],as.numeric)
```

## Inputs {.sidebar}

```{r, echo=FALSE}

selectInput("indicator", label = "Select indicator:",
          choices = colnames(df)[-9], width = "200%")

reactive_data <- reactive({
  df %>% select(Country, input$indicator)
})
```

## Row

```{r, echo=FALSE}
g <- list(
  scope = 'africa',
  projection = list(type = 'albers'),
  showlakes = TRUE,
  lakecolor = toRGB('LightBlue')
)

m <- list(
  l = 10,
  r = 10,
  b = 10,
  t =40,
  pad = 1)

renderPlotly({
  newdata <- reactive_data() 
  newdata <- newdata %>%
    rename(xx=input$indicator)
  
  fig <- plot_geo(newdata, 
                    locationmode = 'country names', 
                    text = ~paste0(newdata$Country, ": ",  newdata$xx)
                  )
  
  fig <- fig %>% add_trace(
    z = ~xx, locations = ~Country, hoverinfo = "text" ,
    colors = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(11, "BrBG")[6:11]
  )
  fig <- fig %>% hide_colorbar()
  fig <- fig %>% layout(title = paste0(input$indicator),
    margin=m,
    geo = g, annotations = list(x = 0.2 , y = 1.05, text = " ", showarrow = F, 
                                xref='paper', yref='paper'), 
    showlegend = FALSE
  ) 
  
  fig

})

```
